title: S2 Ep55: The Reincarnation of Marilyn Monroe w/ Adrian Finklestein - Hr.1
itunes:title: The Reincarnation of Marilyn Monroe w/ Adrian Finklestein - Hr.1
description: Dr. Adrian Finklestein is a huge believer in the field of reincarnation and he believes he has found the Holy Grail in Sherrie Lee Laird.  Sherrie believes in a past life she was Marilyn Monroe and has some compelling evidence to back it up!  In hour 1, Dr. Finklestein builds his case for Reincarnation and why he believes so strongly in it!
itunes:author: Darkness Radio
dc:creator: Darkness Radio
